description: Mapping from dataset activities to Atlas v3 motion-based atomic motions
note: Static activities (sitting/lying/standing) share 'stationary' atomic motion - cannot be distinguished in zero-shot

realdisp.note: REALDISP - 33 diverse exercises with 9 full-body sensors

selfback.note: SelfBACK - 9 activities with gait variations (wrist/thigh sensors)

forthtrace.note: Activities + transitions with talking variants - 16 classes

wisdm.note: WISDM - 18 diverse activities with phone/watch sensors

capture24.note: Capture-24 - Large-scale daily living (10 activity classes, 151 participants, ~4000 hours)

chad.note: Complex Human Activity Database - 13 activities with pocket/wrist sensors

mex.note: Low back pain exercises - 7 therapeutic movements

imwsha.note: Smart Home Activities - 11 daily activities with wrist/chest/thigh sensors

openpack.note: Industrial packaging operations - wrist/forearm sensors only

lara.note: Logistic warehouse activities - 8 classes with semantic attributes

tmd.note: Transportation mode detection - 5 modes (Walking, Car, Still, Train, Bus)
